template.name: ApplicationDeploymentFailure
template.body:
## BEGIN SECTION Subject A process on $application.getName() failed ## END SECTION Subject ## BEGIN SECTION Body ## PROPERTY Content-Type: text/html

A process on $application.getName() failed

#if ($snapshot) #end
Application: $application.getName()
Process: $applicationProcess.getName()
Snapshot: $snapshot.getName()
Environment: $environment.getName()
Requested by: $user.getName()
Requested on: $fn.formatDate($request.getSubmittedDate())
Description: #if ($request.getDescription()) $request.getDescription() #end
#macro (showSummary $analysis $level $rowType) #set ($indentPixels = $level * 20) #set ($trace = $analysis.getTrace()) $trace.getName() #set ($activityResource = $trace.getPropertyValue("activity.resource.id")) #if ($activityResource) $resourceFactory.getResourceForId($fn.getUUID($activityResource)).getPath() #else $trace.getPropertyValue("resourcePath") #end #if ($trace.getStartedOn()) $fn.formatDate($trace.getStartedOn()) #else Activity not started #end #if ($trace.getStartedOn() && $trace.getEndedOn()) $fn.duration($trace.getStartedOn(), $trace.getEndedOn())s #end $fn.getStatusDisplayName($trace.getResult()) #foreach ($child in $analysis.getChildren()) #set ($nextLevel = $level + 1) #showSummary ($child, $nextLevel, $rowType) #end #end

Process summary

#foreach ($child in $analysis.getRootAnalyses()) #if ($velocityCount % 2 == 1) #set ($rowClass = "odd") #else #set ($rowClass = "even") #end #showSummary ($child 0 $rowClass) #end
Process Resource Start Duration Status
#macro (showFailure $analysis $level) #set ($indentPixels = $level * 20) $analysis.getTrace().getName() #if ($analysis.getChildren().isEmpty()) #set ($indentPixels = $indentPixels + 20) $analysis.getFailureMessage() #end #foreach ($child in $analysis.getChildren()) #set ($nextLevel = $level + 1) #showFailure ($child, $nextLevel) #end #end

Failure details:

#foreach ($child in $failureAnalysis.getRootAnalyses()) #showFailure ($child 0) #end
#if ($versions.size() > 0)

Included versions:

#foreach ($version in $versions) #if ($velocityCount % 2 == 1) #set ($rowClass = "odd") #else #set ($rowClass = "even") #end #end
Component Version Description
$version.getComponent().getName() $version.getName() #if ($version.getDescription()) $version.getDescription() #end
#else

No versions included

#end
More information about this process request is available at $externalUrl#applicationProcessRequest/$request.getId().toString(). IBM UrbanCode Deploy ## END SECTION Body
